mapper.update: update CXHNWX.T_FEE_DETAIL set INJURY_NAME = #{injuryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM = #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPEC = #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_NUMBER = #{itemNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELF_AMOUNT = #{selfAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INJURED_ID = #{injuredId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACT_DATE = #{actDate,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, INJURY_NAME, ITEM, ITEM_NAME, SPEC, PRICE, ITEM_NUMBER, AMOUNT, SELF_AMOUNT, INJURED_ID, ACT_DATE, STATUS from CXHNWX.T_FEE_DETAIL where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, INJURY_NAME, ITEM, ITEM_NAME, SPEC, PRICE, ITEM_NUMBER, AMOUNT, SELF_AMOUNT, INJURED_ID, ACT_DATE, STATUS from CXHNWX.T_FEE_DETAIL
